weekly_top_story.headline: California's DHCS Implements New Medi-Cal Rx Policy Changes Starting November 1, 2025
weekly_top_story.summary: California's Department of Health Care Services (DHCS) has rolled out significant policy changes to Medi-Cal Rx to enhance drug coverage and access for Medicaid beneficiaries, potentially impacting prescribing practices and pharmacy operations statewide.

stories.headline: Open Enrollment for ACA Health Plans Begins November 1, 2025, Amid Concerns Over Premium Increases
stories.summary: The 2026 open enrollment period for Affordable Care Act plans starts November 1, 2025, with anticipated premium increases causing concern for consumers and healthcare professionals involved in patient insurance navigation.

stories.headline: HHS Expands Access to Affordable Catastrophic Health Coverage Starting November 1, 2025
stories.summary: The U.S. Department of Health and Human Services has expanded the availability of hardship exemptions for Marketplace coverage to improve access to affordable catastrophic health insurance beginning November 1, 2025.
stories.source: U.S. Department of Health and Human Services
